title: 7.6 Patch
body: I just downloaded the new patch (7.6) like any other league player and went straight into a game. I noticed in the first like 2 or 3 minutes when i got my camera locked on my champion and click the mouse to go back and forth or diagonal pivoting, i could clearly see some fps issues on my screen like fps drops but there weren't any actual fps drops shown on the fps counter in-game. Yesterday it was running perfectly fine but now it has that small fps drops whenever i click back and forth etc. Unlocked camera is fine, didn't do any other updates on my PC apart from League Of Legends. Didn't change anything at all regarding Settings. Need help ASAP. Thanks :3

replies.body:
There could be an issue with your config that's not responding to your camera settings properly.  As a first step, try resetting your config to see if that helps.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if this works for you.

Bummer, but thanks for trying!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) then so our tech team can take a closer look with you.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to automatically grab some logs, which will help give us a bit more context.  We'll reply back as soon as possible.
Alright man thx for your time tho
